This is a testharness.js-based test.

FAIL TextDecoderStream should be able to reject invalid sequences in UTF-16BE promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextDecoderStream is not defined"

FAIL TextDecoderStream should be able to reject invalid sequences in UTF-16LE promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextDecoderStream is not defined"
